game.name: Tisnart Tiles
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Tisnart Tiles takes you beyond ordinary match-3 games with 120 levels full of exciting twists and surprises!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tisnart Tiles takes you beyond ordinary match-3 games with 120 levels full of exciting twists and surprises!

reviewHighlights.text: [h1] Puzzle game where you have to click most adjacent tiles in same color. With a bit of twist and changing game mechanics like different gravity of...
